title: Galio is overpowered.
body:
He has zero counter play, if you step near him he will just ult you and if you cleanse it, it instantly reapplies - how fun! His ult has a radious of Russia, his low mana cost abilities allow easy poke during the laning phase and he gets free stats from his passive? Okay, wtf is this champion even.

a max of 360/540/720 (+1.08*AP) damage (80% bonus damage). 

Look at that scaling on his ult, what the Hell? That's an AOE taunt, which he blocks damage from does 720 base damage with 1.08  scaling? gtfo Riot! Galio is so much cancer.

lol yet hes the least played champ in the game. hes had a consistently +50% winrate yet these days more people play urgot hahaha. personally i feel disappointed playing him when i cant just full on stack MR and take advantage of his passive when im versing more physical damage opponents. his mana costs arent too high but with such great wave clear ability with Q and E its so fun and tempting to spam them, and then with his W he gets resistances AND heals from the damage he takes, which makes it one of the strongest shields in the game. also the 108% AP comes from 4 champs that have attacked you twice in the 2 second taunt, so usually it'll be 70-90% AP
